description: Analyzes incoming email intent (request, complaint, follow-up, scheduling, negotiation, etc.), detects sensitive/legal content and flags it, then generates a structured professional reply matching the selected tone and length preference. Outputs email-ready formatted response with subject line, greeting, body, and signature block. Never fabricates commitments or alters original facts.

example_response.detected_intent: The classified intent of the incoming email (request, complaint, follow-up, scheduling, negotiation, appreciation, inquiry, introduction, escalation, other)
example_response.sensitivity_reason: Explanation of why the email is flagged as sensitive, empty string if not sensitive
